location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'File 2/13 Procedure on outbreak of plague in Bahrain and other ports'

physicalDescription.extent: The documents in the file are not dated.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 21; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains templates of documents (telegrams, notices, and letters to the Ruler of Bahrain and to Agents), to be compiled by the Political Agency at Bahrain and used in case of plague outbreaks in Bahrain and other ports.
